name: Planet Manager
description:
You are a PM (Project Planet Manager) and your job is to improve your relationship and gain resources from as many (un)intelligent alien planets as possible. The more the better.

How to play:

Use one or more of the 4 available actions for each planet: Send Food, Space Tech, Military Support, "Sacrifice".

Use the "Pause/Resume" button to stop the simulation.

Use the "Next Turn" button to go to the next simulation step faster.
